fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Doot someone, roleblocking them with a unique message, and granting them powerful defense for the night
- Strangle someone, attacking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, you will receive 2 roles to doot and 2 roles to strangle. They can be any role that can die to a powerful attack in the game. If they are converted, you will be notified
- **Bone Defense:** If you die, you will come back the next day because skeleton logic
Goal: Doot and strangle your victims.
